name: GingerRed Naturals
description: GingerRed Naturals is for a Mom in Montana that had a need for a showcase of her home-made natural products for her community.

name: VeriGate
description: A device created with security in mind. Verigate turns your gate operator into an IoT device, allowing you to control your gate operator by allowing who gets in.

name: BoyAlgo
description: This stock alert bot scans a list of your stocks for its current price and compares it to the target prices you have set. @BoyAlgo will notify you with a tweet with the details of the alert.
